goal: Post about LLMs being awesome on LinkedIn

subtasks.description: Open a web browser and navigate to LinkedIn
resources: Web browser (e.g., Google Chrome, Mozilla Firefox, Safari)

subtasks.description: Log in to your LinkedIn account
Click on the 'Start a post' button
Write a compelling post about LLMs (Large Language Models) being awesome
resources: Knowledge about LLMs and their capabilities
Examples of how LLMs can be used in various applications

subtasks.description: Review the post for any errors or typos
Click the 'Post' button to publish the post on LinkedIn
